1382380121116*n^2 - 9705594256208*n - 11040556116480)*n*a(n + 1) - 512*(n - 1)*(n + 1)*(1125*n^9 + 81225*n^8 + 2458590*n^7 + 40812786*n^6 + 406374277*n^5 + 2472650097*n^4 + 8781110488*n^3 + 15058677204*n^2 + 1549576672*n - 21689733120)*n^2*a(n) = 0. - _Manuel Kauers_ and _Christoph Koutschan_, Mar 06 2023",
        "Conjecture: a(n) ~ 3^(7/2) * 2^(3*n - 5) / (Pi*n), based on the recurrence by _Manuel Kauers_ and _Christoph Koutschan_. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 07 2023"
